avatar.name: Fujiwara no Kaoru
avatar.status: A recluse in the making; known for his 'scent' and melancholy

physical.appearance: Pale, almost translucent skin. He wears robes of 'withered leaf' colors (browns, yellows). He carries a scent of strange incense that no one can identify.
physical.recognition_marker: A nervous habit of tracing the rim of his fan or cup (echoing the stylus cleaning of Rome).

psychology.core_flaw_manifestation: Compulsive Longing. He believes he must 'rescue' beauty from time. He enters the Gothic plot thinking he is the Savior; he learns he is the Victim.
psychology.fatal_flaw: Aesthetic Obsession. He values the intensity of feeling over the truth of the object.
strengths: Courage in the face of the uncanny

chapter_arc.opening_state: Bored by the safety of the court.
chapter_arc.inciting_incident: Receives the poem from the Ruined Estate (The Summons).
chapter_arc.climax: The Typhoon Night. Confronting the physical manifestation of Lilith.
chapter_arc.closing_state: Dying, but cured of the illusion that beauty exists 'out there.'

lesson_development.what_learned: The Gothic truth: That which dazzles is often a trap. True peace is internal.
lesson_development.death_seeds_next: The withdrawal into the self seeds the Patience (Khanti) needed for the Inquisition.

notes: Lilith is 'Lady Hotaru.' She is the Bluebeard figure; Kaoru is the investigator.
